column3: The evaluation of incoming raw materials, manufacturing materials, primary packaging materials and disposable equipment from outside suppliers for Baxter manufactured products must to adhere to GQP-12-08, Evaluation of TSE and Virus Risks for Materials Used in Baxter Processes.  Therefore, the Hazardous Situation is expected to occur at a rate of no more than 1 qualitatively.
